Package com.group26.node

Enum NodeState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<NodeState>
      • com.group26.node.NodeState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<NodeState>
    public enum NodeState
extends java.lang.Enum<NodeState>
    Class that determines the states of the node when joining and participating in the network.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      ASSIGNING_ID
      State at which the node tries to acquire an id address from the nearest neighbor that it found during the previous state.
      FINDING_NEIGHBORS
      State at which the node only tries to find its neighbors by repeatedly pinging.
      PULLING_TOPOLOGY
      State at which the node awaits the network topology from its id provider.
      READY_TO_SEND
      State at which the node is ready to send chat messages and participate in the network converging.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static NodeState[] values()

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • FINDING_NEIGHBORS

        public static final NodeState FINDING_NEIGHBORS
        State at which the node only tries to find its neighbors by repeatedly pinging. Also, the node does not respond to any incoming packets until the next state.

      • ASSIGNING_ID

        public static final NodeState ASSIGNING_ID
        State at which the node tries to acquire an id address from the nearest neighbor that it found during the previous state. If the node did not find any neighbors, then it takes any possible id.

      • PULLING_TOPOLOGY

        public static final NodeState PULLING_TOPOLOGY
        State at which the node awaits the network topology from its id provider. If there is any missing information, then it sends a direct request.

      • READY_TO_SEND

        public static final NodeState READY_TO_SEND
        State at which the node is ready to send chat messages and participate in the network converging. Also, the node periodically pings its neighbors to determine if they are still in the network and updates its topology correspondingly.

    • Method Detail

      • values

        public static NodeState[] values()
        Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared. This method may be used to iterate over the constants as follows: 
        for (NodeState c : NodeState.values())
    System.out.println(c);

        an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared
